quotes.text: Student nurses value a welcoming workplace where staff and educators are happy to help and have a positive attitude to student presence on the wards
quotes.author: Doyle et al, (2017) Nurse Education Today 49 pages 27–32

quotes.text: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.text: I believe success is preparation, because opportunity is going to knock on your door sooner or later but are you prepared to answer that?
quotes.author: Omar Epps

mainParagraph.text:
This resource was adapted by Arinola Adefila and Diane Phimster of Coventry University, with acknowledgement to colleagues as the University of Lincoln, as part of one of the 'Addressing barriers to student success' HEFCE Catalyst projects.
This resource was created by Ben Walker and Alison Wilkinson (University of Lincoln) as part of one of the ‘Addressing barriers to student success’ HEFCE Catalyst projects. The structure and content of this resource has been adapted from: Stork A. and Walker B. (2015) Becoming an Outstanding Personal Tutor: Supporting Learners Through Personal Tutoring and Coaching. Northwich: Critical Publishing.
